column4: If Direct Rendering is not enabled after install... should I try enabling it somehow?... or does it just mean that there are no appropriate drivers for my system?
what does lspci | grep -i vga   return?
VGA Comptable controller: Intel Corporation 82830 CGC rev 4
use a pastebin to paste your /etc/X11/xorg.conf  so I can see it
http://pastebin.ca/904318    its a bit messy in some parts since I am trying to get my touchscreen up and running
but glxinfo | grep -i direct returns no?
is this a somewhat old system?
Yeah a little Toghbook P3 866 Laptop.
http://pastebin.ca/904323   ....you may need to load some modules, see my modules section
but ignore the rest...especially my device section ;)
you are using the right driver though at least.
Thanks for the .conf... I'm trying those modules now  :-)
you might also find    man intel   to be of some help
you might try googling about for your chipset and xorg.conf ...might find some example ones
Any suggestions as what more I can try?... I've tried googling it without much luck but mind you I didnt try chipset.
from my searching it appears DRI with the 830 is crummy anyway...oh well :/
